object.property: Please specify a time interval
Group artist filter tab by compilation CDs
If checked, sorting will be case sensitive. Please note that case sensitive sorting will not work well with most charsets.
'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM < d < DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM' or similar. Press 'enter' when finished.
'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM < d < DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM' or similar. Press 'enter' when finished.
'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM < d < DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM' or similar. Press 'enter' when finished.
Automatically start displaying tracks that match the criteria entered above. If not selected, you must press 'Display' to start displaying.
Display tracks that match the criteria entered above.
In order to save the displayed track order to the iPod choose 'Save Displayed Track Order' from the 'Edit' menu or select 'Auto Store' below.
